org.codice.ddf.registry.federationadmin.service

Interface FederationAdminService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FederationAdminServiceImpl

    public interface FederationAdminService
    Service that provides the interface to get and add registry metacards This code is experimental. While this interface is functional and tested, it may change or be removed in a future version of the library.

    • Method Detail

      • addRegistryEntry

        String addRegistryEntry(String xml)
                 throws FederationAdminException
        Add a registry metacard entry for the xml string provided. Converts the string to a registry metacard using the RegistryTransformer.
        Parameters:
        xml - String representation of a registry package xml
        Returns:
        Id of the created metacard
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If the xml string is blank. If an exception is thrown from the registryTransformer. The CatalogFramework throws an exception trying to the metacard.

      • addRegistryEntry

        String addRegistryEntry(String xml,
                        Set<String> destinations)
                 throws FederationAdminException
        Add a registry metacard entry for the xml string provided. Converts the string to a registry metacard using the RegistryTransformer.
        Parameters:
        xml - String representation of a registry package xml
        destinations - Set of destinations to add
        Returns:
        Id of the created metacard
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If the xml string is blank. If an exception is thrown from the registryTransformer. The CatalogFramework throws an exception trying to add the metacard.

      • addRegistryEntry

        String addRegistryEntry(Metacard metacard)
                 throws FederationAdminException
        Add the given metacard to the registry catalog
        Parameters:
        metacard - Metacard to be stored
        Returns:
        Id of the created metacard
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If the metacard provided was null. The CatalogFramework.create call throws IngestException or SourceUnavailableException

      • addRegistryEntry

        String addRegistryEntry(Metacard metacard,
                        Set<String> destinations)
                 throws FederationAdminException
        Add the given metacard to the registry catalog with the provided destinations
        Parameters:
        metacard - Metacard to be stored
        destinations - Set of destinations to add
        Returns:
        Id of the created metacard
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If the metacard provided was null. The CatalogFramework.create call throws IngestException or SourceUnavailableException

      • addRegistryEntries

        List<String> addRegistryEntries(List<Metacard> metacards,
                                Set<String> destinations)
                         throws FederationAdminException
        Add the given metacards to the registry catalog with the provided destinations
        Parameters:
        metacards - Metacards to be stored
        destinations - Set of destinations to add
        Returns:
        List of Id's for the created metacards
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If the metacard provided was null. The CatalogFramework.create call throws IngestException or SourceUnavailableException

      • deleteRegistryEntriesByRegistryIds

        void deleteRegistryEntriesByRegistryIds(List<String> registryIds)
                                 throws FederationAdminException
        * Deletes the registry entry from the registry catalog for each of the provided registry ids.
        Parameters:
        registryIds - The list of registry ids to be deleted.
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If the list of ids provided is empty. If IngestException or Source UnavailableException was thrown by CatalogFramework.delete

      • deleteRegistryEntriesByRegistryIds

        void deleteRegistryEntriesByRegistryIds(List<String> registryIds,
                                        Set<String> destinations)
                                 throws FederationAdminException
        Deletes the registry entry from the registry catalog for each of the provided registry ids. A set of destinations is sent in the delete request
        Parameters:
        registryIds - The list of registry ids to be deleted.
        destinations - Set of destinations to add
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If the list of ids provided is empty. If IngestException or Source UnavailableException was thrown by CatalogFramework.delete

      • deleteRegistryEntriesByMetacardIds

        void deleteRegistryEntriesByMetacardIds(List<String> metacardIds)
                                 throws FederationAdminException
        * Deletes the registry entry from the registry catalog for each of the provided metacard ids.
        Parameters:
        metacardIds - The list of metacard ids to be deleted.
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If the list of ids provided is empty. If IngestException or Source UnavailableException was thrown by CatalogFramework.delete

      • deleteRegistryEntriesByMetacardIds

        void deleteRegistryEntriesByMetacardIds(List<String> metacardIds,
                                        Set<String> destinations)
                                 throws FederationAdminException
        * Deletes the registry entry from the registry catalog for each of the provided metacard ids. A set of destinations is sent in the delete request
        Parameters:
        metacardIds - The list of metacard ids to be deleted.
        destinations - The set of destinations to be added
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If the list of ids provided is empty. If IngestException or Source UnavailableException was thrown by CatalogFramework.delete

      • updateRegistryEntry

        void updateRegistryEntry(Metacard metacard)
                  throws FederationAdminException
        * Write the provided metacard to the registry catalog. Updating the metacard currently stored.
        Parameters:
        metacard - Metacard with updates to be stored in the registry catalog
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If the provided metacard doesn't have an id. If CatalogFramework.update call throws IngestException or SourceUnavailableException

      • updateRegistryEntry

        void updateRegistryEntry(Metacard metacard,
                         Set<String> destinations)
                  throws FederationAdminException
        Write the provided metacard to the registry catalog. Updating the metacard currently stored with the provided destinations.
        Parameters:
        metacard - Metacard with updates to be stored in the registry catalog
        destinations - Set of destinations to add
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If the provided metacard doesn't have an id. If CatalogFramework.update call throws IngestException or SourceUnavailableException

      • updateRegistryEntry

        void updateRegistryEntry(String xml)
                  throws FederationAdminException
        Update a registry metacard for the xml string provided. The string will be converted to a registry metacard using the RegistryTransformer.
        Parameters:
        xml - String representation of a registry package xml
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If the provided metacard doesn't have an id. If an exception is thrown from the RegistryTransformer If CatalogFramework.update call throws IngestException or SourceUnavailableException

      • updateRegistryEntry

        void updateRegistryEntry(String xml,
                         Set<String> destinations)
                  throws FederationAdminException
        Update a registry metacard for the xml string provided. The string will be converted to a registry metacard using the RegistryTransformer. The metacard will be updated with the provided destinations
        Parameters:
        xml - String representation of a registry package xml
        destinations - Set of destinations to add
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If the provided metacard doesn't have an id. If an exception is thrown from the RegistryTransformer If CatalogFramework.update call throws IngestException or SourceUnavailableException

      • getRegistryMetacards

        List<Metacard> getRegistryMetacards()
                             throws FederationAdminException
        Get a list of registry metacards
        Returns:
        List
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If any exception was thrown by the call to CatalogFramework.query()

      • getRegistryMetacards

        List<Metacard> getRegistryMetacards(Set<String> destinations)
                             throws FederationAdminException
        Get a list of registry metacards
        Parameters:
        destinations - Set of destinations to query from
        Returns:
        List
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If any exception was thrown by the call to CatalogFramework.query()

      • getLocalRegistryMetacards

        List<Metacard> getLocalRegistryMetacards()
                                  throws FederationAdminException

        Returns:
        List
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If any exception was thrown by the call to CatalogFramework.query()

      • getRegistryMetacardsByRegistryIds

        List<Metacard> getRegistryMetacardsByRegistryIds(List<String> ids)
                                          throws FederationAdminException
        Get a list of registry metacards with the provided registry ids. It won't run the query if the list provided is empty.
        Parameters:
        ids - List of IDs to to get metacards for
        Returns:
        List
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If empty list of registry ids is provided If the list of id filters isn't created If any exception was thrown by the call to CatalogFramework.query()

      • getLocalRegistryMetacardsByRegistryIds

        List<Metacard> getLocalRegistryMetacardsByRegistryIds(List<String> ids)
                                               throws FederationAdminException
        Get a list of local registry metacards with the provided registry ids. It won't run the query if the list provided is empty.
        Parameters:
        ids - List of IDs to to get metacards for
        Returns:
        List
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If empty list of registry ids is provided If the list of id filters isn't created If any exception was thrown by the call to CatalogFramework.query()

        Throws:

      • getRegistryObjectByRegistryId

                                                  Set<String> sourceIds)
                                           throws FederationAdminException

        Returns:
        List
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - If an exception is thrown trying to unmarshal the xml

      • getLocalRegistryIdentityMetacard

        Optional<Metacard> getLocalRegistryIdentityMetacard()
                                             throws FederationAdminException
        Returns the identity metacard for the local registry node.
        Returns:
        Optional containing the Identity Metacard
        Throws:
        FederationAdminException - if more than one metacard was found
